package.string: astre.async
The astre.async package contains classes for the asynchronous checkouts API.
astre.conditions
The astre.conditions package contains the base classes for creating conditions, along with common used condition classes.
astre.core
The astre package contains the top-level classes of the Astre Framework.
astre.printer
The astre.printer package contains the classes for live result's printing.
astre.processor
The astre.processor package contains all the core classes of the Test Processing API.
astre.processor.process
The astre.processor.process package contains processes that can be executed by the test processors.
astre.runner
The astre.runner package contains classes for running, manipulating tests along with collecting and manipulating results.
astre.runner.manipulation
The astre.runner.manipulation package contains classes for manipulating tests and their results.
astre.runner.manipulation.resultRules
The astre.runner.manipulation.resultRules package contains classes for manipulating test results.
astre.runner.manipulation.runRequestRules
The astre.runner.manipulation.runRequestRules package contains classes for manipulating the tests' run sequence.
astre.util
The astre.util package contains classes to help creating enumerations, ready-to-use logging and do code reflection.
